programme.title: Kids' Planet - Confidence, Honesty, and Integrity - EP118
programme.desc: In this episode, we will discover the values of confidence, honesty and integrity. We will learn that we build trust by fulfilling the promises we make to others. We will learn about different sports and disciplines and how to show respect to our opponents.

programme.title: Mellodees - London Bridge Is Falling Down - EP6

Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: ONE Fight Night 38: Andrade vs. Baatarkhuu
programme.desc: The stars will shine the brightest when the world’s largest martial arts organization returns to the Thai capital for ONE Fight Night 38: Andrade vs. Baatarkhuu. This blockbuster showcase features several martial arts veterans, and it will be topped by a pair of must-see World Title battles. In the headline attraction, ONE Bantamweight MMA World Champion Fabricio Andrade looks to continue his reign of devastation and cap off the year with another highlight-reel knockout for the ages. But #4-ranked contender Enkh-Orgil Baatarkhuu, who is fresh off his appearance on Netflix’s Physical: 100, wants to follow in the footsteps of his mentor Narantungalag Jadambaa and become the next Mongolian to capture ONE World Title gold. In the co-main event, two-time ADCC World Champion Diogo “Baby Shark” Reis will square off against Japanese BJJ black belt Daiki Yonekura for the ONE Flyweight Submission Grappling World Title. Plus, British Muay Thai legend Liam Harrison, BJJ icon Marcelo Garcia...

programme.title: Kidaverse Roblox Rumble - Kidaverse Roblox Rumble Ep6 - EP6

programme.desc: The beyond surreal adventures of Felix The Cat and his friends set in an incredibly weird and fantastical toon world where everything is alive and only dream logic rules. Each episode has three segments.

programme.title: Baby Einstein - World of Colors
programme.desc: Share a rainbow of sights and sounds with your baby as you discover the wonders of color together! Join puppet host "Vincent Van Goat" as he creates six Van Gogh masterpieces exploring red, green, blue, yellow, orange, and purple. World Of Colors is a spirited celebration of creative expression.

programme.title: Kids' Planet - Love - EP120
programme.desc: In this episode, we will learn about the value of love. We will understand that when we have love in our hearts, we care about the well-being of others, so we make them happy. Pets must also be treated with love and respect. The first step to accepting that we are unique is by loving ourselves. Respect is a big part of love and when love is in our heart, there is no place for negative feelings.

programme.title: Mellodees - You Are My Sunshine - EP7
programme.desc: It's story time! Dee and Teddy snuggle up with a good book before bed time. Sing-A-Long as they take you on an adventure in the jungle while reading the story of "You Are My Sunshine"!

programme.desc: The Rangers check whether their chimp friend Ernest is ready to return to the wild; after a terrible earthquake, the Rangers try to save a group of ducks.

programme.title: Thomas Edison's Secret Lab - Burpin’ Babies / Backpack Payback - EP118
programme.desc: Kent’s youth serum works a little too well and turns the gang into screaming babies. The serum soon wears off – sort of – now they’re adults trapped in baby bodies and Von Bolt doesn’t know whether to obey or burp them. / When the Anti-Matters steal JD's backpack and discover the portable ALVA, they unwittingly cause Edison's hologram to disappear. The Secret Lab Kids must concoct a plan to retrieve the backpack before Edison's lost forever.

programme.title: Secret Millionaires Club - A Midwestern Yankee In King Arthur's Court, Pt. 1 - EP112
programme.desc: Warren, the SMC, and Starty travel to Camelot on a Quest for Six Golden Rules that will save Young Arthur's Kingdom.

programme.title: Superhero Kindergarten - Captain Fantastic Begins - EP124

programme.title: Yeti Tales
programme.desc: Join Us in Yeti Tales !

programme.title: Timmy Time
programme.desc: Being an ‘only lamb in the flock’ Timmy has been used to getting his own way. Now for the first time Timmy is going to have to learn to get along with other little animals. Timmy is going to Nursery! Self-willed and naughty Timmy is going to have to learn how to share things with other youngsters and think about their feelings – not just his. Timmy is a gifted little footballer who needs to learn that it’s not enough to kick the ball – you have to pass it too. Harriet Heron and Osbourne Owl, who run the Nursery are going to have their hands full, but Timmy gets it right in the end with a little help from his friends of the furry, feathery and spikey type.

programme.title: Misha, the Purple Cat
programme.desc: Misha is a very lively, alert cat. She is very interested in investigating everything going on around her, which means she has some very entertaining adventures with her friends. Many things can happen in Misha’s world; especially exciting adventures, mysterious investigations, hilarious competitions... all with a feeling of close friendship.

Bino and Fino have many adventures where, with the help of their friend Zeena the Magic Butterfly, they discover and learn things about the world.

programme.title: Horaci the Inuit
programme.desc: Packed with adventure, fun and excitement, HORACI THE INUIT will transport you to the Lands of the North where, together with his best friend Sedna, he will have to solve all kinds of mysteries! programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1976 - EP1
programme.desc: Another 60 minutes of heatwave hits & headlines from a year of contrasts - Punk, Dancing Queen, the Inter-City 125, the Honey Monster & that year's top toy - Swingball!

programme.title: Simon Bates Golden Hour: 1975 - EP1

programme.title: Simon Bates NEW Golden Hour: 1974 - EP1
